title: Fox to air Trump pre-taped interview during Super Bowl pregame show
shortDescription: Fox's political anchor Bret Baier speaks with President Trump in a pre-taped interview to air during Super Bowl pregame show. Here's what to know.

title: Trump to use obscure 18th century wartime law in mass deportations
shortDescription: Donald Trump wants to deport immigrants alleged to be gang members without court hearing using the Alien Enemies Act.

title: Musk says he and Trump are putting USAID 'into the wood chipper'
shortDescription: Tech billionaire Elon Musk said he is feeding the Washington foreign aid agency "into the wood chipper" as part of an effort to slash federal spending.

title: Biden administration slowed arms to Ukraine until term was nearly done
shortDescription: In the final year of President Joe Biden’s term, decisions on key shipments and weapons in Ukraine were stalled, a Reuters investigation found.

title: Trump breaks norms, shocks allies and opponents with bold policies
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is taking an unorthodox path to shake up Washington and change federal policy to his priorities.

title: Protestors opposing Trump's immigration policy block LA traffic
shortDescription: Demonstrators marched in downtown Los Angeles on Sunday in response to President Donald Trump's immigration crackdown.

title: Trump to talk tariffs with leaders of Canada and Mexico on Monday
shortDescription: Trump has said tariffs are a way to force the countries to stop the flow of migrants and fentanyl across the borders and into the U.S.

title: China denounces Trump tariff: 'Fentanyl is America's problem'
shortDescription: China's sharpest pushback on Sunday was over fentanyl, an area where the Biden administration had also been urging Beijing to crack down on shipments.

title: Dozens more USAID staff ousted as Trump administration dismantles aid agency
shortDescription: The Trump administration over the weekend put on administrative leave dozens more staff at U.S. Agency for International Development.

title: Trump says Americans could feel 'some pain' as he sets his sights on new tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Sunday said there could be 'some pain' as he prepares to impose tariffs on Canada, China and Mexico.

title: Sean Duffy vows it's safe to fly after plane crashes, echoes Trump DEI criticism
shortDescription: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said his department will come out with a plan to address critical understaffing in control towers across the country.

title: Donald Trump brings blitzing strategy back to White House
shortDescription: The returning president's pace is a more focused, stringent use of executive power that excites supporters while keeping foes off balance

title: Mexico, Canada retaliate against Trump tariffs as trade war kicks off
shortDescription: Mexico and Canada responded to the U.S. trade action with a 25% tariff against $155 billion worth of American goods as trade war kicks off next week.

title: Trump follows through on tariff threats against Canada, Mexico & China
shortDescription: The new tariffs on imports from all three nations ‒ which are on top of existing taxes and go into effect on Tuesday.

title: Trump orders military airstrikes that kill ISIS militants in Somalia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced Saturday that he ordered military strikes that killed several ISIS militants in Somalia.

title: President Trump on Mount Rushmore? Congresswoman introduces bill
shortDescription: Florida Congresswoman Anna Paulina Luna introduced a bill to carve President Donald Trump into Mount Rushmore alongside four other presidents.

title: Trump's public statements on D.C. crash could end up in lawsuits
shortDescription: Families of the victims in Wednesday’s catastrophic airline collision could receive a boost in lawsuits from high-profile comments accepting blame.

title: Trump says he halted $50 million in condoms for Gaza. Is it true?
shortDescription: The U.S. has spent millions of dollars to send contraceptives to other countries. Did Trump's White House really stop $50 million in condoms for Gaza?

title: He led the Jan. 6 committee. He worries more violence may be ahead.
shortDescription: Congressman worries that Trump's pardon of 1,500 people who attacked the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021 creates risk for more bloodshed

title: Trump's envoy leaves Venezuela with 6 Americans after meeting Maduro
shortDescription: One of US envoy Richard Grenell's top aims for the visit with Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro securing the release of detained Americans.

title: Trump tackles government regulation in dramatic new executive order
shortDescription: The president's latest order requires federal agencies repeal "at least 10 existing rules" for every new rule created.

title: Trump's DOJ launches purge of Jan. 6 prosecutors, FBI agents
shortDescription: A group representing FBI agents issued a rare public warning of the potential for hundreds of firings at the nation's top law enforcement agency.

title: Federal government websites go dark, following White House directive
shortDescription: Federal agencies are reshaping their messaging to reflect President Donald Trump's priorities.
